```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

This file contains the genepop output files created by the code in the R folder.
HW = hardy-weinburg
LD = linkage disequilibrium
TAB = Contingency tables for genotypic disequilibrium
FST = frequency based correlation
INF = Basic data for each locus in each population
cmdline and fichier.in are files that genepop uses
